query.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:DIM:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:LICENSE_RIGHTS:b.group_code:group_code@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:LICENSE_RIGHTS:b.group_name:group_name@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:LICENSE_RIGHTS:a.lic_right_type:lic_right_type@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:LICENSE_RIGHTS:b.description:description@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:LICENSE_RIGHTS:c.name:license_type@ FROM cmn_lic_right_v a, cmn_sec_groups_v b, cmn_lic_lookup_v c WHERE a.group_code = b.group_code AND a.id = b.id AND c.lookup_code = a.lic_right_type AND b.language_code=@WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ AND c.language_code=@WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ AND b.is_active = 1 AND b.group_code != 'AdminApiAccess' AND EXISTS (select 1 FROM cmn_sec_chk_user_r_v0 WHERE object_id = 1 AND permission_code = 'AdminAccess' AND user_id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_ID@) AND @FILTER@
